wikipedia_page.main: Ian Richards (born 5 October 1979) is an English former footballer. He began his career with Blackburn Rovers but failed to make the first team and moved on to Halifax Town, where he made 24 Football League appearances. He has since gone on to play for non-league teams Belper Town and Stocksbridge Park Steels. He now manages Penistone Church F.C. located in Sheffield and is now Vice Principal at Penistone Grammar School.

response: * Ian Richards (admiral) (born 1930), Royal Australian Navy officer, Deputy Chief of Naval Staff 1983–84
* Ian Richards (South African cricketer) (born 1965), South African cricketer
